1.「あら？ <pc>！| あなたも アラハギーロに 来ていたの？: What?<pc> Oh, my God! You've been to Arrahaguillo, too?

3.「ええ。<pc>は 勇者の盟友なんです。| 私と ともに戦ってくれる 大切な人で: Yeah.<pc> is an ally of the brave... The one who fights|with me, the one I love.

4.「なんと！ 勇者の盟友！？: Oh, my God! An ally of the brave!

5.「……道理で いいはたらきをするはずじゃ。| <pc>には 何度も世話になっての: ... No wonder it works so well.<pc> I've been in your debt a lot... I'm glad to|hear that...

6.「して…… <pc>。| 幻日の鏡の件は どうなった？: Do<pc> What about the mirror? What happened to the|mirror?

8.「いやいやいや！ 勇者の盟友ともあろう| <pc>のことじゃ！| 本当は なんと: No, no, no! You are an ally of the brave.<pc> I mean! You really did something about it,|didn't you?

9.<pc>は ムーニス王に|幻日の鏡を 渡した！: <pc> has given the Mirror of the Illusion to King|Moonyth!

10.「おおっ！ おぬし どこで これを？| ……なるほど！ 偽りのレンダーシアか。|: Oh! Where did you get this? I... I see! The|false renders... I didn't know you could do|that!

11.「まあ <pc>。| あなた ムーニス王のお手伝いをしてたのね。| でも 大事な: oh!<pc> . You're here to help King Moony... But I|think you're forgetting the most important|thing.

12.「ムーニス王。| じつは 私たちは 神の緋石を探して| このアラハギーロ王国へ: Mu... We have come to the Kingdom of|Alajaguilo in search of the Scarlet Stone of|God...

13.「ピラミッドには 太陽の石室という聖なる場所が| あると聞きました。私は そこに: I'm told there's a sacred place in the|pyramids called the sun chamber. I believe|that's where the Scarlet Stone of God...

14.「うーむ。たしか…… <pc>も| そのようなことを 言っておったな。: I... I think...<pc> That's what he said...

15.「よしよし！ ふたりの頼みでは 断れん！| ちょうど行くところじゃったし アンル: All right, all right! I can't say no to a|request from you two! I was just on my way.|And Princess Anne Lucia.<pc> You should come with us...

17.「ムーニス王！ まだ ピラミッドへ| 出発なさらぬのですか？ いったい| いつま: King Moony! Have you not yet set out for the|pyramids? How long do you think you'll have|time to prepare?

18.「むっ！ 今から行こうって| アンルシア姫と 話しておったんじゃもん！| これか: No! I was talking to Princess Anrushka about|going now! We were just about to leave!

19.「お前たちも 来るのじゃ！| ワシの 護衛をしてたもれ！: You must come with me! You'll be my guards!

20.「では アンルシア姫。そして <pc>。| おぬしたちも 気をつけてまいるのじゃ: So, Unle... And...<pc> I'm sorry. You be careful...

21.「ワシは 先に行って| 太陽の石室の前で 待っておるからのう！: I'll go ahead and wait for you in front of|the Sun Chamber!

22.「そういえば ピラミッドには| ある特殊な踊りに反応する 仕掛けがあると| 聞い: You know, I've heard that the pyramids have a|mechanism that responds to certain types of|dancing...

23.「じゃあ 私たちも 出発しましょうか。| ピラミッドの 太陽の石室まで| できる: Well, we're off... I want you to get to the|Pyramid, the Sun Chamber, as fast as you can.<pc> ！

24.「……ここが 太陽の石室？| 確かに 中に 何かありそうな雰囲気だわ。: ... This is the Sun Chamber? It sure looks|like there's something inside...

25.「おおっ。待たせてしまったかの？| すまん すまん。: ... Did I keep you waiting? I'm sorry, I...

26.「では さっそく 太陽の石室を開くから| そこで 見ててたもれ！: Then I'll open the sun chamber and you can|watch from there!

27.「我は アラハギーロ王家の血を 引く者！| この地に眠る 我が祖先たちよ。| 我: I am of the royal blood of Araghaguilo! My|ancestors lie in this land... Answer my call!

28.「太古より 天照らす 太陽よ！| 幻日の鏡をもって その光を 石室に捧げん！|:
From the beginning of time, the sun shines in|the heavens! With the mirror of daylight,|cast your light upon the stone chamber! Now|
|open the way before me!

29.「やった！ やった！ 開いたぞよ！| ピラミッドの財宝を ゲットするぞよ～！: Yes! We did it! It's open! We're going to get|the treasure of the pyramid!

31.「どういうことじゃ？| 石室の中は もぬけの殻ではないか。| 秘宝は どこにいっ: What do you mean? The stone chamber is a|complete wasteland. Where is the treasure?

32.「<cs_pchero> 見て！ 神の緋石よ！: <cs_pchero>Look! It's the Scarlet Stone of God!

33.「神の緋石に 近づくんじゃねえ 小娘！: Stay away from the God's Scarlet Stone,|little girl!

34.「いいい 今のは ワシじゃないぞよ。: No, that wasn't me. That was...

35.「おい お前のことだ！ デコっぱち！！| 汚ねえ手で オレさまが壊す緋石に| 余:
Hey, it's you! You're the one with the big|mouth! Don't you dare do anything with your|filthy hands to the Scarlet Stone that I'm|
|about to break!

39.「ケケケッ！ オレさまは 妖魔将ゲジュラ！| そこのヒゲもじゃが オレさまを こ: Kekeke! I'm Demon Lord Gezura! I've been|waiting for you bearded bastards to bring me|here!

40.「役目とは言え ヒゲもじゃのおっさんに| ずっと くっついてるのは 大変だったぜ: It's not easy being stuck with a bearded old|man all the time, even for a role! I almost|had him by the throat!

41.「だが ここまで来たからには 今まで| 我慢してた分も 好きにやらせてもらうぜ！: But now that I've come this far, I'm going to|do whatever it is I've been holding back! I|want you to use all of my poison!

42.「……誰も この毒に耐えることは できねえ！| 骨まで溶かす妖毒で お前を ドロ: ... No one can withstand this poison! I'll|melt you down to the bone with this poison|and make you squirt and squirt and squirt!

44.「<cs_pchero>！ 戻ったのね！| 今度こそ 神の緋石を守るわよ！！: <cs_pchero>You're back! You're back! This time, I'll|protect the God's Scarlet Stone!

45.「なかなか しぶてえ デコっぱちだぜ！| オレさまの毒を喰らっても| まだ こり: You're a tough little bastard! You've been|poisoned by me, and you still can't get over|it?

46.「……誰も この毒に耐えることは できねえ！| 骨まで溶かす妖毒で 何度でも ド: ... No one can withstand this poison! I'll|melt you down to the bone with this poison|and make you slurp and slurp again and again!

47.「ち…ちくしょうっ……| オレさまの…… 骨まで溶かす 妖毒が……| ど…どうし: God... God damn it... My... The poison that|will melt you to the bone... What the...|Why...

49.「やったわね <cs_pchero>！| じゃあ さっそく 神の緋石に| 勇者の: You did it<cs_pchero>I'm sorry. Then I'll start pouring the power|of a brave man into the Scarlet Stone of God.

50.「……これで ここの神の緋石は| 神代のチカラを取り戻したわ。| もう 大魔王に: ... The Scarlet Stone has regained its divine|power... The Great Demon King can't touch it|anymore...

51.「輝きを取り戻した 神の緋石とは| こんなに 美しいものじゃったのか……。: The God's Scarlet Stone has regained its|brilliance. It's so beautiful...

52.「アンルシア姫よ。ダメもとで聞くが| この神の緋石は 我が国にあったものじゃし|: Unlesi... I'm going to take a wild guess and|say that this God's scarlet stone is from my|country. Would it be wrong to sell it?

53.「ダメですよ。| この神の緋石は 大魔王の侵略を阻み| レンダーシアを守ってくれ: No... This divine scarlet stone will protect|Lendencia from the invasion of the Great|Demon King.

54.「アラハギーロ王家には この地にある| 神の緋石を 守る使命があるのです。| こ: The House of Alajaro has a mission to protect|the Scarlet Stone of God... I ask that you|continue to protect it.

55.「……そうか。そんな使命が あるとも知らず| 秘宝を 売ろうとか考えておったとは:
...... I didn't know you had such a mission.|I didn't know you were thinking of selling|the treasure. If I had a pressure point, I'd|
|go in there.

56.「あいわかった！ このピラミッドと太陽の石室| そして 神の緋石を これまで以上: All right! I promise to protect this pyramid,|the Chamber of the Sun, and the Scarlet Stone|of God better than I ever have.

57.「それはそれとして…… 結局 民の暮らしを| 楽にしてやることは できんかった。: That's the thing... In the end, you can't|make people's lives any easier... ... I don't|know what I'm going to do now...

58.「……ここで考えていても 仕方がない。| アラハギーロへ戻るとするかの。お前たち: ... I can't stop thinking about it. I'm going|back to Arrahaguillo. Oh... I'm sorry to have|wasted your time.

59.「お待ちください ムーニス王。| こちらに 気になる碑文が……。: One moment, please. Moo... There's an|interesting inscription here...

63.「……神の緋石のもとに 恵みの果実！？: ... Under the scarlet stone of God, the fruit|of grace!

64.「こ これは！| まさか…… シャイニーメロンか！？: Oh, my God! It's not... Shiny Melon?

65.「甘くて たっぷりの汁気と| 豊富な栄養素を 合わせ持ち…… しかも| 砂漠の気: Sweet, juicy, nutrient-rich... And it's easy|to grow in a desert climate. It's a miracle!

66.「……５００年ほど前に すべて焼失したと| 聞いておったが まさか こうして|: I heard... I'd heard it all burned down 500|years ago, but I never imagined my ancestors|would leave it all behind!

67.「これぞ まさに 砂漠の秘宝！！| これを育てれば 民の生活も いずれ豊かになり: This is the true treasure of the desert! If|we can grow it, our people will have a better|life and our country will be restored!

68.「アンルシア姫。そして <cs_pchero>。| 数々のチカラ添え 心から感謝: Unruh... And...<cs_pchero>Thank you! I thank you from the bottom of my|heart for all your help! You fought well,|brave man and ally!

69.「……そう言えば <cs_pchero>。| 幻日の鏡の礼を まだ渡しておらんか: Speaking of which<cs_pchero>I... I haven't given you the Mirror of the|Illusion yet, have I? You'll have to come to|the castle later. I'm counting on you!

70.「<cs_pchero>。私は この地の| 神の緋石が チカラを取り戻したことを: <cs_pchero>I have come I'm here to report to Lord|Lushenda that the Scarlet Stone has regained|its power.

71.「あなたは アラハギーロに戻るんでしょ？| ムーニス王に よろしく言っておいてね: You're going back to Araghaguilo, aren't you?|Give my regards to King Moonsis...

72.「……ずいぶん チカラを失っているみたい。| 早く 勇者のチカラを 注ぎ込まなく: ... I've lost so much strength... We must|infuse her with the power of the brave!

The instructions for the dance are written on|a stone tablet in the pyramid. If you see a|stone monument, you might want to use this to|
|decipher it.

74.「それでは <pc>どの。| 毎度のことで 本当に 申し訳ありませんが……| ム: in which case<pc> Which. I'm really sorry about all this,|but... Take care of King Moenis for me!
